QuestData.Title: Vengeance or Survival
QuestData.Description: Tell Greymane that we have trackers on Sylvanas and tell him about the Plague.$B$BThe decision will be his. Launch an all out attack against the leader of the Forsaken or try to evacuate our survivors.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to King Genn Greymane at Greymane Court in Gilneas City.
QuestData.RewardText: You present me with the most difficult choice of my life, $n.
